key_points: Android support allows for GUI Emacs on Android devices
Touchscreen interactions such as pinch-to-zoom and context menus work
TUI Emacs also supports touchscreen events

technical_terms.definition: Native Android support allows Emacs to be built for Android devices natively using a graphical interface.
technical_terms.name: Android support

technical_terms.definition: Touchscreen interactions such as pinch-to-zoom, context menus, and gesture recognition are enabled in Emacs for Android devices.
technical_terms.name: Touchscreen interaction

technical_terms.definition: TUI Emacs supports touchscreen events, enabling users to interact with their device using touch screens.
technical_terms.name: TUI Emacs
